text: Lucio Edwin Gutiérrez Borbúa (born March 23, 1957) served as President of Ecuador from January 15, 2003 to April 20, 2005. He unsuccessfully ran for president again in the 2021 election. Gutiérrez was born on March 23, 1957 in Guayaquil, Ecuador. He was married to Ximena Bohórquez. ==Other websites== * Biography by CIDOB Foundation * Presidencia de la República * Seeking asylum in Colombia * Arrest Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil
title: Lucio Gutiérrez
